bug.author: gugarosa
bug.description:
There is a typo on the contrastive loss wrapper. Not that it will change a lot, but it is nice to keep things straight. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/addons/blob/v0.10.0/tensorflow_addons/losses/contrastive.py#L100>https://github.com/tensorflow/addons/blob/v0.10.0/tensorflow_addons/losses/contrastive.py#L100</denchmark-link>
Best regards, Gustavo.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gugarosa>@gugarosa</denchmark-link> nice catch! Would you like to submit a PR to fix it?
Sure, sounds great! Let me clone the repo and submit it.
